data.name: Wordish
data.detailed_description:
Wordish takes word games to the next level! Find the proper words in this challenging and customizable puzzle game. Try to guess the word using a limited number of tries. Challenge your friends through share codes or even with live multiplayer!

Features
  • A new puzzle each day to challenge yourself
  • Endless customizable challenge levels to continue playing
  • Challenge your friends through codes or even live multiplayer
  • Level up your game through the xp system
  • Relax with a nice fireplace
  • Share your results and challenge other players

data.short_description: Wordish takes word games to the next level! Find the proper words in this challenging and customizable puzzle game. Challenge your friends through codes or even with live multiplayer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.66 Ghz Core 2 Duo or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500+ / Radeon 5000+ or Greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1+
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Quad Core or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600+ / Radeon 6000+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.66 Ghz Core 2 Duo or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500+ / Radeon 5000+ or Greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Quad Core or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600+ / Radeon 6000+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.66 Ghz Core 2 Duo or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500+ / Radeon 5000+ or Greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Quad Core or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500+ / Radeon 5000+ or Greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
